Amir.title: Amir
Amir.description: You are an [color=#bf9f40]Explorer[/color] of the obelisk, assisted by trusty [color=#bf9f40]Scouts[/color]. You wield a [color=#a0ffa0]Bow[/color].
Amir.brief: A battle-chief. Leads devout followers on the path of Achra.
Amir.name: [color=#bf9f40]Amir[/color]

Warrior.title: Warrior
Warrior.description: You are an adorned, pompous [color=#f0205f]Warrior[/color]. Your attacks are trained and accurate. You wield a [color=#a0ffa0]Scimitar[/color].
Warrior.brief: A haughty mercenary. Trained to fight close-range.
Warrior.name: [color=#ffaf50]Warrior[/color]

Templar.title: Templar
Templar.brief: An exultant swordsman. Revels in killing and religious devotion.
Templar.name: [color=#40a0ff]Templar[/color]

Nihang.title: Nihang
Nihang.brief: A figher trained in a sacred battle-art. Channels piety into offensive power.
Nihang.name: [color=#a08080]Abdi[/color]

Mubarizun.title: Mubarizun
Mubarizun.brief: A renowned duelist-champion. Cuts enemies through a whirling dance.
Mubarizun.name: [color=#f0a030]Mubarizun[/color]

Zealot.title: Zealot
Zealot.brief: A self-abnegating fanatic. Constantly propitiates the gods.
Zealot.name: [color=#d04040]Zealot[/color]

Ascetic.title: Ascetic
Ascetic.brief: A spiritual purist. Gains power through stillness.
Ascetic.name: [color=#8020a0]Ascetic[/color]

Gala.title: Gala
Gala.brief: A holy reveler with a chant of unending vigor.
Gala.name: [color=#4080af]Gala[/color]

Warlock.title: Warlock
Warlock.brief: A volatile sorcerer devoted to prayer and death.
Warlock.name: [color=#7020a0]Warlock[/color]

Priest.title: Priest
Priest.brief: A judgemental mystic. Frantically dispenses a blood curse.
Priest.name: [color=#ff5030]Priest[/color]

Druid.title: Druid
Druid.brief: An animal-beckoning monk of the wilderness.
Druid.name: [color=#20d060]Druid[/color]

Summoner.title: Summoner
Summoner.brief: An aspiring mystic. Channels willpower into conjured allies.
Summoner.name: [color=#a070ff]Summoner[/color]
